metadata.title: Enrichment URL - Forcepoint
metadata.description: This playbook checks if malicious URL is blocked or unblocked by SMC firewall.
mainSteps: 1. Fetches a list of potentially malicious URLs
2. Enrich the incident with URL status information.
prerequisites: 1. Forcepoint SMC Custom Connector needs to be deployed prior to the deployment of this playbook under the same resource group.
2. Forcepoint SMC API Key should be known.[Refer here](http://www.websense.com/content/support/library/ngfw/v610/rfrnce/ngfw_6100_ug_smc-api_a_en-us.pdf )
3. Forcepoint SMC Version number should be known. [Refer here](https://help.stonesoft.com/onlinehelp/StoneGate/SMC/)

metadata.description: Enter name for playbook without spaces
Enter the name for your Forcepoint SMC Connector without spaces
Enter the api key for smc login
Enter SMC Api key Version Number

Assign_URL_Address_to_Array.description: Asiign URL Address to URLAddressarray to reuse.

Append_to_array_variable_to_URLaddress_v.description: Appending URL address from incident to URLaddress variable

body.message:
@{outputs('Forcepoint_Logo')}Forcepoint NGFW Enrichment URL playbook ran for the below URLs and it gives the information for each URL that how many policy rules are exist.

@{body('Create_HTML_table_for_Add_comment_to_incident')}

Create_HTML_table_for_Add_comment_to_inc.description: Creating a HTML table from all actions taken by IP address

Append_to_array_variable_to_URL_Address_.description: Append to array variable to URL Address in Policy to send adaptive card to SOC

Append_to_array_variable_to_all_actions.description: Append to array variable to all actions

Append_to_array_variable_to_array_items.description: Appening the consolidate success object into array

Set_variable_to_consolidate_item_variabl.description: Creating success object for URL Address to comment the incident

Check_the_result_length_from_filter_outp.description: We will check for the result output is empty or exist in the policy rule. If result output is empty ,then there is no policy based on IP Address. And If result ouput is having some information related to IP Address then there is a policy with respect to IP

Set_variable_to_consolidate_variable_aft.description: Set variable to consolidate variable after URL blocked

Append_to_array_variable_when_policy_rul.description: Appening the consolidate error object into array

inputs.name: Error
inputs.value: Error status code @{outputs('Find_IP_or_URL_in_SMC')?['statusCode']}  Issue occurred while finding the rule @{items('Looping_URL_Address')} in the policy rule .

Set_variable_to_get_policy_rule_defaut_s.description: Adding an error comment to "Error" variable

Set_variable_while_getting_rule.description: Creating error object for URL Address to comment the incident

Condition_for_check_policy_rule_by_URL_a.description: This condition is going to check result output from Get Policy rule by IP or URL-Forcepoint SMC

Looping_URL_Address.description: Here we are looping each URL Address and check whether it is blocked or not

Set_variable_to_login_unsuccessful.description: When unsuccessful login atempt has done then we can bind the error to "Error" variable.

Login.description: Before take an action against to any other api in Forcepoint SMC we need to do login.

inputs.name: Error
inputs.value: URL Address not found from sentinel incident.

Set_variable_to_error_variable_if_URL_Ad.description: Binding the error to "Error" variable and pass it to incident comment.

Terminate_if_body_is_not_contain_URL_fro.description: Terminate if body is not contain URL from sentinel

Check_if_body_present_from_output.description: Form this condition, we will check like if body present in the sentinel incident or not and we will check the Ip address are available or not.

Initialize_variable_for_URL_Address.description: Binding URL address to this URL address variable

Initialize_variable_for_URL_Address_in_P.description: Initialize variable for URL Address exists in the Security policy

Initialize_variable_to_Error.description: To keep the error into this variable and pass it to wherever required.

Initialize_variable_to_SMC_Api_Version_N.description: To keep SMC Api version number. Forcepoint will update the SMC version every year

Initialize_variable_to_consolidate_varia.description: To form a JSON object to pass it into Allaction variable

Initialize_variable_to_keep_all_actions.description: To store IP address , severity , action to be taken into one array varriable and we can create a table.

Policy_Element_Key.description: Policy element key is to store policy element key for add or remove policy rule

SMC_API_Key.description: SMC API Key is to store Api key for login

URL_List_Key.description: We can store URL list key after adding url list
